Package org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice

The package includes classes that allow to start the control panel service ControlPanelService, and manage the list of controllable devices ControllableDevice.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeviceEventsListener
    The interface to be implemented in order to receive ControllableDevice relevant events
    DeviceRegistry
    Used as a callback interface to inform the interface implementer about new discovered devices and changes in their reachability state
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllableDevice
    The class includes the generic information about the controllable device.
    ControlPanelCollection
    ControlPanelCollection represents a family of the DeviceControlPanel objects per language that belong to the same functional Unit
    ControlPanelService
    Provides the main methods for control panel service
    DefaultDeviceRegistry
    The default implementation of the DeviceRegistry interface.
    Unit
    The class represents a functional unit of the controllable device ControllableDevice
    The unit might has a list of the ControlPanelCollection
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ControlPanelException  

Package org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice Description

The package includes classes that allow to start the control panel service ControlPanelService, and manage the list of controllable devices ControllableDevice.
The list of controllable devices is managed by the DeviceRegistry interface and its default implementation DefaultDeviceRegistry
For each controllable device there is a list of the device control panels DeviceControlPanel that is passed to the user when ControllableDevice.startSession(DeviceEventsListener) is called. By using the DeviceControlPanel a user may call org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ui.DeviceControlPanel#getRootContainer(String) to retrieve the root UI container
